    • Method Detail

      • createTempFile

        public static java.io.File createTempFile(java.lang.String prefix,
                          java.lang.String suffix)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Create a temporary file in the application's working directory. The application's working directory is defined by var.hcss.workdir if this property exists. If not, it's defined by the system property java.io.tmpdir (see #TEMP_DIR).
        Parameters:
        prefix - - prefix for the file name
        suffix - - suffix for the file name
        Returns:
        new file in a temporary directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if errors occur when creating the file or directory

      • createTempDir

        public static java.io.File createTempDir(java.lang.String prefix,
                         java.lang.String suffix)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Create a temporary directory in the application's working directory. The application's working directory is defined by var.hcss.workdir if this property exists. If not, it's defined by the system property java.io.tmpdir (see #TEMP_DIR).
        Parameters:
        prefix - - prefix for the directory name
        suffix - - suffix for the directory name
        Returns:
        new directory inside a temporary directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if errors occur when creating the directory or its parents

      • delete

        public static boolean delete(java.io.File f)
